Judul: PROPOSED NEW BUSINESS MODEL  FOR ACCELERATING ENERGY SAVING INVESTMENT A CASE STUDY OF ENERGY SERVICES PRODUCT  OF PT. TRANE INDONESIA
Abstrak:
Around the world, many nations have started to acknowledge the impact of global climate change including Indonesia. Therefore in 2016, Indonesia with other nations signing on to participate in the first legally binding global climate deal on the Conference of Parties 21 in Paris. (United Nations , 2015) Based on that agreement Indonesian government committed to reducing its greenhouse gasses emission through the First National Determined Contribution Republic of Indonesia agreement (The Republic of Indonesia, 2016). One of the points in the agreement is to cut energy-related emissions is through reducing energy consumption in buildings.      
 
 
 

Globally, buildings account for 36%-44% of total final energy consumption with 60% of that number comes from the HVAC system. As a leading supplier of HVAC equipment Trane sees that problems as opportunities to offer a new range of product and services which focused on energy conservation measures. This research intended to analyze, formulate and implement sets of strategies to capture that market through the development of a new business model besides enhancing PT. Trane Indonesia value position within the market.     
 
 
 

The conceptual framework used to perform this research derives from Rothaermel Analyze Formulate and Implement Framework. (Rothaermel, 2013). PESTEL, PorterÃ‚Â’s Five Forces (Porter, How Competitive Forces shapes Strategy, 1979), VRIO Framework (Barney & Hesterly, 2010) , Value Chain Analysis (Porter, Competitive Advantage, 1998) will be the core analysis tool in combination with Financial Analysis on different financing option available for energy conservation project. Root problem will be derived from the set of strategic questions based on the analysis above. Business strategy formulation will be derived from PT. Trane Indonesia strategic position within the market. Corporate strategy formulation will focus on diversification and horizontal integration strategy. Additional financing strategy will be used to determine which finance solution is most suitable for the customer utilizing the financing decision tree. The newly generated business model will be derived from Business Model Canvas using nine business model building blocks. (Osterwalder & Pigneur, 2010). Implementation of formulated strategies will follow Core Competence Model in the form of four different business models. (Hamel & Prahalad, 1996). It is then executed in four phases following diversification framework roadmap. In the end, financial strategic analysis tools will be implemented to analyze the feasibility of the energy conservation project.
Kata Kunci: Energy Conservation Measures, HVAC, Business Model Canvas, Core Competence Model.
